@Gabriel911Z @PeterSweden7 Come to Canada! We have a large Chinese community already. It's moderately free. Like America, but with the dial turned to simmer instead.

tweet_text:
The other day, for example, i talked someone who i had previously thought of very high, in terms of both deen and dunya...
And towards the end of the conversation, this person in the calmest and most casual of tones, advised me to "not take islam so seriously"

tweet_text: @LeyMeToRest “Trust me on this, it was all you.
